name: InteractWithObject
description: Interact with an object to examine, manipulate, or engage with it.
usage: Use this action when you want to interact with an object in a general way.

parameters.name: object_name
parameters.description: The name of the object to interact with

requirements: Object must be nearby and interactable
Object must be included in the available interactable entities
whenToUse: Want to interact with interactive elements
Need to engage with objects in the environment
